title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 426.10 - Exemptions; revocation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 426.10 - Exemptions; revocation

State Regulations
(a) Exemptions from specific provisions of this Part may be granted the training
programs of the fire department of any county, city, town, fire district, or
county fire training entity, which, in the opinion of the firefighting
personnel standards and education commission, are equal to or exceed the
provisions required in this Part. (b) Revocation in whole or in part of
exemptions granted for a firefighter training program of the fire department of
any county, city, town, fire district, or county fire training entity shall be
made, if, in the opinion of the firefighting personnel standards and education
commission, said fire training program is below the provisions outlined in this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
426.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
